She looked at her grandfather, whom looked very happy. "Here's hoping we can get some of the maids there to also work as shrine maidens. Am I right my dear Rei?" He said joyfully. Rei sighed at his perversion.

1132212.content:
A young girl with red hair proceeded to answer the door. "Oh! You must be Rei Hino! We've been expecting you!" The girl proceeded to say. "Welcome! My name is Aiko Ishikawa! I am happy to serve you. We're pleased of you to have come to live with us."

Rei shook her head and said "My home will always be the shrine I grew up in, but I appreciate the warm welcome." Aiko looked over Rei to see her grandfather and Ami. "I had no idea you were bringing family over!" she said excitedly. "You have such and adorable grandfather!" Hearing this made Rei's grandfather blush. "And you also have such a cute little sister." Ami was shocked that Aiko immediately thought she was Rei's sister. She didn't know what to do for this.
1132212.title: The door opens

Ami shook her head. It's just a misunderstanding. there wasn't any reason to hide the fact that she and Rei were not related. "Actually, I'm not actually her sister. I'm actually a friend of hers." Aiko laughed at her response and said "That's a relief. Considering how you two looked nothing alike, it was hard to tell." Rei was confused by that comment as she thought, So you immediately decided to assume that she was my sister?

Aiko continued to open the door further. "Come on in! this is your home." Ami the proceeded to ask, "Does this mansion have a library?" Aiko nodded and said "of course. make yourself at home."

Another maid then proceeded to show up and say, "I can show you where the library is if you would like Miss Ami." Rei sighed, looked at Ami, and said, "Good ahead. Just remember to keep your guard up." Ami nodded as she proceeded to follow the maid to the library.

Aiko then turned to Rei's grandfather and said, "I'm sure some of our maids are busy in the kitchen. We've been planning a big feast for Miss Rei's arrival." Hearing this, Rei's grandfather dashed into the dining room. This left Rei alone with Aiko.

Rei traveled to the dining alongside Ami, Mako and Minako who all followed behind her. "It's good that we are all back together again girls." she started to say. "I think we all can agree that we wasted our time being Sailor Guardians." the others nodded their heads. "That being said, we have plenty of work to get done."

Minako spoke up, "I suppose you know how to help him fully recover?" Rei snickered. "We need to collect souls. Once we have enough, he'll be able to use his full power again. I already helped him by setting him free, but I know he needs more than just the freedom I've granted him. Stronger souls are better. don't settle for weaker souls."

Ami nodded with a smile and said, "Don't worry Rei. We'll make sure that we don't harm anybody we don't need to." Rei nodded. "I know you won't. That's why I'm asking all of you to go and search for souls."

Mako proceeded to stand. "Will Usagi be aiding us in this voyage?" Rei shook her head and said, "She still has much to endure before I can consider allowing her into the Shadow Guardians." Rei quickly took a look out the window. "We'll need to make some serious changes to this world after Ragna has recovered." Rei continued looking out the window for a moment before turning back around. "I know you can all handle it." Ami and Minako proceeded to get up.

"Mercury Shadow Power" "Jupiter Shadow Power" "Venus Shadow Power"

"MAKE-UP!"

The three proceeded to transform into their shadow guardian uniforms. "We'll make sure the job is done. We owe Ragnarok for waking us up too." Shadow Jupiter proceeded to say. Rei nodded. "We'll begin our task in three days. That should be more than enough time for you to plan something out to attract stronger souls."

Outside the window Rei had been looking out, Luna was hiding. Those girls are the last that I would want to be spotted by! she thought. Out of everyone here, they know me. If they spotted me, they would recognize me instantly. Still, this doesn't sound good. I'm certain that if I can reach into one guardian, We'll be able to stand a fighting chance.

Rei proceeded to get up. "Alright then. This meeting is dismissed. Remember. Three days and the it's off to work." The guardian proceeded to leave the building.

This empress sounds like a serious threat to us. still, to turn one of her soldiers to our side could prove of benefit. I'll inject him with a less powerful dosage than I did with Mami.

Kaoru began crying. "Can you really grant, what my empress Exodine has denied me all these years?" Rei nodded. "I can. Though this procedure may hurt for a bit."

Kaoru then spoke up again. "I devoted my soul to the Exodine. She strengthened my soul, but it never brought me happiness. only pain."
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.title: Rei turns him into a maid

1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.content:
"Wait Rei I can replace Kaoru's soul,"said Shadow Chibi Moon.

"You can do that?"asked Rei."Really let me see this power of yours."

Shadow Chibi Moon then Proceeds to replace Kaoru's soul with a nicer one.

"Oh thank you I won't forget this,"said Kaoru.

"Let him go he won't cause any more trouble will you?"asked Shadow Chibi Moon.
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.title: Shadow Chibi Moon offers to replace Kaoru's...

choices: Everybody waits for Kaoru to wake up.
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.content:
"I promise you. For freeing me from the burden the empress had put on me, I will not cause you any actual harm again," he responded. "I am in your gratitude and shall serve Ragnarok from now on."

Rei smiled upon hearing this and gave a sinister snicker. "Very good. I'm glad you've made such a decision. Now allow me to grant you the other wish." she then proceeded to jab him with her nails. upon removing them, Kaoru's body began changing to match his face and voice. Kaoru looked in a nearby mirror to see she had now become a complete woman. "That's it. the real me." With the last of her strength, Kaoru turned to Rei with a smile. "Thank you... My new mistress..." she proceeded to say before collapsing. Shadow Jupiter and Shadow Chibi Moon proceeded to catch her. Rei held Kaoru's sword. "We could use more combat worthy maids." she said. "Our new recruit should be a welcome addition. Still, we should all be on the lookout for anymore followers of Exodine. If she is against my dear beloved, then she must be dealt with."
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.title: He won't

choices: "Yes I would love to Mistress..however can Mami become one as well?"
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.content:
"So Usagi..what made you come out and help us?"asked Rei.

"Well,,I just felt that Mistress and her friends were in trouble and I had to help,"answered Usagi.

"So..for helping us would you like to become a Shadow Guardian?"asked Rei."I can also restore those memories for you."
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.title: Rei talks with Usagi

1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.content:
"I'm afraid that is beyond my abilities." Rei responded. "I can however, grant her the fighting spirit that she had back before either of you became maids." Mami was shocked at what Rei said as Rei put her hand upon her hand. "Chibiusa? Can you be a dear and go fetch me some water?" Rei asked. Mami felt a sudden jolt, and after Rei released her hand, Mami grabbed a rose from a nearby vase. "Usako..." she started to say. "Have I ever told you that your beauty is the same as the most well nurtured rose?"

Rei snickered. "She may not be a Shadow Guardian, but I believe The Rose suits her fine." she said. "and for our dear Chibiusa, I've left another gift for you Mami." Mami was confused for a moment before looking down. "Do I have a..." Rei then shrugged. "You weren't supposed to notice yet."

Rei then turned to Usagi. "Now then, who shall be the Shadow Guardian to awaken her power?"
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.title: Mami The Rose

choices: Usagi doesn't regain all her memories.
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.content:
"Shadow Mercury can you do the honors?"asked Rei as Chibiusa returned with some water."Thanks Chibiusa."

"Are you alright Rei?"asked Chibiusa handing her the water.

"Yeah I am fine,"answered Rei.

Usagi then touched Shadow Mercury and shadows then came from her to Usagi.
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.title: Shadow Mercury

choices: Aiko and Chibiusa get to know eachother better
Chibiusa goes to bed for the night
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.content:
As the shadows covered Usagi, memories of her past started completely flooding back. "Ami... You're Ami." as the shadows cleared, Usagi was now in a completely black dress. She then looked at the other shadow Guardians. "Mako... and Minako." Usagi smiled. "Yes. and Mami. You're..." Just then, memories of who Mami formerly was also flooded back to Usagi. She then turned toward Rei. "That's right. You turned my dear Mamo into a girl! How could you, Rei!"

Rei then proceeded to sigh. "Yes. Mami is in fact Mamoru." she started to say much to Mami's slight confusion. "However, even Mamoru as the woman you know as Mami, you've still shown to love her in the end. Correct?" Usagi then looked at Mami and walked up to her and held her hand. She's right. no matter what gender, Mami is still my Mamo... on the inside. she thought as she and Mami proceeded to share a kiss.

Chibiusa then handed Rei the two souls she had. Rei was impressed with the power of the two. "These souls have so much power. One of them is clearly Kaoru's old one." she said. Chibiusa nodded, smiled, and thought, They're all so nice. I've hardly seen Rei perform any actual acts of evil even with these dark powers. In fact, Maybe things will be better this way for us. Artemis. Luna. Sorry. I'm going to help Rei and the others save Ragnarok. I might be trading in my status as Sailor Chibi Moon, and so early, but that's fine as long as I'm with my friends.
1132212212221121111121221212212121211222.title: Usagi regains all her memories.

115.content: So then which of these Guardians shall be changed?
115.title: Somebody Else

info.brief_description: The cast of Sailor Moon go through some changes outside of the norm for them.
info.description:
I'm back to start up another interactive story. I've noticed a distinct lack of Sailor Moon, so I figured this would be a good one to start up. Not going to put up any serious rules for this one other than that the main transformation can't be ones natural to the series. Meaning Usagi turning into Sailor Moon wouldn't work since she does it throughout the series anyway. Not saying those transformations can't happen. They just can't be the focus.

I would also like to ask not to use the names of the Dic/Cloverway dub. This is to make things a little less confusing and because the Super S season was never dubbed. Stick with the Japanese names.

Other than that, anything goes here.

Can't wait to see the transformation stories that you guys write with me.
